title: Add Google site verification meta tag

requirements.summary: Add Google site verification meta tag to the HTML head section
acceptanceCriteria: The meta tag is present in the <head> section of frontend/index.html
The meta tag includes the exact content attribute value: 3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7...
The meta tag is properly formatted as a self-closing HTML tag

file_operations.description: Add the Google site verification meta tag <meta name="google-site-verification" content="3JcpygsB7VEyNJC7..." /> inside the <head> section, positioned after existing meta tags but before the Open Graph properties. Do not modify any other meta tags or head content.
